titleStmt.title: Severall speeches, spoken by the right honourable the Earle of Loudoun, Lord high chancellour of the Kingdome of Scotland at a conference with a committee of the honourable houses in the Painted chamber, October 1646.
titleStmt.author: Loudoun, John Campbell, Earl of, 1598-1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
On the dispute between England and Scotland over custody of Charles I.
